name: DO NOT PERCEIVE ME
description:
Everything is harder when you don't fit the mold! This game is about the things we do to help people see us as we are, and how it doesn't even matter because it's out of our control.

Anyways, you ran out of milk and have to go get some more. Try not to talk to too many people or you'll run out of energy and have to go home!

=CONTROLS=

Arrow keys to move! Space to advance conversations!

=WARNING=

This game is about the developers' experiences with dysphoria, misgendering, and social pressures. It's not a serious game, but misgendering and resignation to it are featured heavily- please don't play if this will harm you

Thanks to https://www.bensound.com/ for the music! The songs we used we Acoustic Breeze and Rumble by Benjamin Tissot

Find our artists at https://www.ashwartzberg.com and https://www.instagram.com/laocteau/!
